description: Learn how to transform a few simple ingredients into a vibrant spring salad with this speedy chickpea, beetroot and chicken salad recipe.
name: 4Ingredient Spring Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 375g Woolworths COOK Vietnamese style chicken kebabs
70g canned Edgell chickpeas with zesty vinaigrette

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a chargrill pan over mediumlow heat. Cook kebabs, turning occasionally, for 15 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and lightly charred.
Meanwhile, microwave rice according to packet instructions. Transfer rice to a large bowl. Set aside to cool slightly.
Carefully remove chicken from skewers. Add chicken and salad kit ingredients, including threequarters of the dressing, to rice and toss gently to combine.
Divide salad among bowls. Top with undrained chickpeas and drizzle with remaining dressing. Serve.
